reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: A project is being planned with cooperatives that represent small scale producers and craftsmen in Northern Nicaragua. The project focuses on reinforcing gender equality in the value chain of craftsmen and between other small scale entrepreneurs. Value cha in approach is capitalized on improving the competitiveness of craftsmen and small scale industry. In this approach the operations of the craftsmen in each sector are analyzed within the overall context. Hence the attention is paid also to the providers of raw materials, logistics, small scale entrepreneurs that offer supplementary services, actors of commercial sector and other possible allies of handicraft business (if need be also to the producers of materials and key services). The promotion of economic and social development of women and men is related to the improvement of competitiveness of the small enterprises that are important for local development. The specific thematic, implementation partner, beneficiaries, purpose and expected results of the p roject will be defined more specifically during the project planning phase, which forms the basis for the project implementation.
